Class XMLWriter

public class XMLWriter
extends Object

addStartElement

public void addStartElement(String pTagName,
                            String... pAttributes)
                     throws XMLStreamException
Add a start tag to the current buffer. This method can receive any number of pAttributes. The syntax to use is:
addStartElement("TagName", "firstAttributeName", "firstAttributeValue", "secondAttributeName", "secondAttributeValue", ...)

Parameters:
pTagName - name of the tag.
pAttributes - the attributes to add.
Throws:
XMLStreamException
